text: Portrait of Takeda Hidenobu (1853-1902) by Ōkura Kōtō. Inset picture by Sugihara Kōsei. No. 2 in the table of contents.
title: Picture of Lieutenant Colonel Takeda Smoking under a Hail of Bullets
